Package scheduling.schedulingStrategies.shiftingStrategies

Interface ShiftingStrategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ShiftLongestTimeToDeadlineFirstStrategy

    public interface ShiftingStrategy
    This interface should be implemented by any class that is supposed to be used as a strategy for determining the jobs that should be shifted during a DR event.
    Author:
    nilsw

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • preponeJobs

        int preponeJobs​(java.util.List<BatchJob> submittedJobs,
                java.util.List<BatchJob> affectedSubmittedJobs,
                java.util.List<BatchJob> runningJobs,
                java.util.List<BatchJob> pausedJobs,
                java.util.List<BatchJob> scheduledJobs,
                int amountOfNodesToShift,
                int currentTime,
                int schedulingInterval,
                DC handledDC)
        Prepones jobs that are selceted according to the implemented startegy, to adjust the power consumption profile of the DC.
        Parameters:
        submittedJobs - List of all jobs that were already submitted to the scheduler (excluding affected submitted Jobs).
        affectedSubmittedJobs - List of all jobs that were already submitted to the scheduler, but were not started at the point in simulation time that was specified in the workload trace.
        runningJobs - List of all currently running jobs.
        pausedJobs - List of all currently paused jobs.
        scheduledJobs - List of all currently scheduled jobs.
        amountOfNodesToShift - Amount of node steps that are requested to be shifted according to the current configuration of the power demand flexibility provision techniques.
        currentTime - Point in simulation time at which the interval for which the power adjustment should be adjusted starts.
        schedulingInterval - Length of the currently scheduled DR event in simulation time.
        handledDC - DC to which the scheduler that uses this strategy belongs.
        Returns:
        Amount of node steps that were actually shifted.

      • postponeJobs

        int postponeJobs​(java.util.List<BatchJob> submittedJobs,
                 java.util.List<BatchJob> affectedSubmittedJobs,
                 java.util.List<BatchJob> runningJobs,

                 int amountOfNodesToShift,
                 int currentTime,
                 int schedulingInterval,
                 DC handledDC)
        Postpone jobs that are selceted according to the implemented startegy, to adjust the power consumption profile of the DC.
        Parameters:
        submittedJobs - List of all jobs that were already submitted to the scheduler (excluding affected submitted Jobs).
        affectedSubmittedJobs - List of all jobs that were already submitted to the scheduler, but were not started at the point in simulation time that was specified in the workload trace.
        runningJobs - List of all currently running jobs.
        pausedJobs - List of all currently paused jobs.
        scheduledJobs - List of all currently scheduled jobs.
        amountOfNodesToShift - Amount of node steps that are requested to be shifted according to the current configuration of the power demand flexibility provision techniques.
        currentTime - Point in simulation time at which the interval for which the power adjustment should be adjusted starts.
        schedulingInterval - Length of the currently scheduled DR event in simulation time.
        handledDC - DC to which the scheduler that uses this strategy belongs.
        Returns:
        Amount of node steps that were actually shifted.

      • scheduleForMaximumPowerDemand

        void scheduleForMaximumPowerDemand​(java.util.List<BatchJob> submittedJobs,
                                   java.util.List<BatchJob> affectedSubmittedJobs,
                                   java.util.List<BatchJob> runningJobs,
                                   java.util.List<BatchJob> pausedJobs,
                                   java.util.List<BatchJob> scheduledJobs,
                                   int currentTime,
                                   int schedulingInterval,
                                   DC handledDC)
        Shifts the jobs in the considered interval so that the maximum possible power demand is reached.
        Parameters:
        submittedJobs - List of all jobs that were already submitted to the scheduler (excluding affected submitted Jobs).
        affectedSubmittedJobs - List of all jobs that were already submitted to the scheduler, but were not started at the point in simulation time that was specified in the workload trace.
        runningJobs - List of all currently running jobs.
        pausedJobs - List of all currently paused jobs.
        scheduledJobs - List of all currently scheduled jobs.
        currentTime - Point in simulation time at which the interval for which the power adjustment should be adjusted starts.
        schedulingInterval - Length of the currently scheduled DR event in simulation time.
        handledDC - DC to which the scheduler that uses this strategy belongs.

      • scheduleForMinimumPowerDemand

        void scheduleForMinimumPowerDemand​(java.util.List<BatchJob> submittedJobs,
                                   java.util.List<BatchJob> affectedSubmittedJobs,
                                   java.util.List<BatchJob> runningJobs,

                                   int currentTime,
                                   int schedulingInterval,
                                   DC handledDC)
        Shifts the jobs in the considered interval so that the minimum possible power demand is reached.
        Parameters:
        submittedJobs - List of all jobs that were already submitted to the scheduler (excluding affected submitted Jobs).
        affectedSubmittedJobs - List of all jobs that were already submitted to the scheduler, but were not started at the point in simulation time that was specified in the workload trace.
        runningJobs - List of all currently running jobs.
        pausedJobs - List of all currently paused jobs.
        scheduledJobs - List of all currently scheduled jobs.
        currentTime - Point in simulation time at which the interval for which the power adjustment should be adjusted starts.
        schedulingInterval - Length of the currently scheduled DR event in simulation time.
        handledDC - DC to which the scheduler that uses this strategy belongs.

      • getPostponableJobs

        java.util.List<BatchJob> getPostponableJobs​(java.util.List<BatchJob> submittedJobs,
                                            java.util.List<BatchJob> affectedSubmittedJobs,
                                            java.util.List<BatchJob> runningJobs,
                                            java.util.List<BatchJob> pausedJobs,
                                            java.util.List<BatchJob> scheduledJobs,
                                            int currentTime,
                                            int schedulingIntervalLength)
        Retrieves a list of all jobs that are postponable in the currently considered interval.
        Parameters:
        submittedJobs - List of all jobs that were already submitted to the scheduler (excluding affected submitted Jobs).
        affectedSubmittedJobs - List of all jobs that were already submitted to the scheduler, but were not started at the point in simulation time that was specified in the workload trace.
        runningJobs - List of all currently running jobs.
        pausedJobs - List of all currently paused jobs.
        scheduledJobs - List of all currently scheduled jobs.
        currentTime - Point in simulation time at which the interval for which the power adjustment should be adjusted starts.
        schedulingIntervalLength - Length of the interval for which the power consumption should be adjusted in simulation time.
        Returns:
        List of all jobs that are actually postponable.
